Here you can find the direct links to all the material we provide during the workshop. After the workshop, we will also link to all recorded lectures here. For a guide on how to install Julia/Pluto and how to use the notebooks, please see our [installation page](installation.qmd).

::: {.callout-note}
If you have questions or run into problems, please post in the [github discussion forum](https://github.com/unfoldtoolbox/Unfold.jl/discussions/categories/unfold-jl-workshop-2025)
:::
